::KitKat::

She smiled broudly at the thought of Megatron and HellBeast gone. She 
smiled at her sitting on the throne. She wasn't sure about this, but 
it was a very pleasing thought. 
"Yes, you are most correct. I could care less for them. Please feel 
free to dispose of them at your leasure. But, I have a few questions, 
why have come to do this? What do you wish to gain from all this? You 
showed me an image of me on a throne. Are you planning to be the one 
at my side? Instead of Drillbit?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  "You know who. I doubt you feel much concern for him but to make 
sure we are 
> not heard." he sent a direct imagery to her brain. The pictures 
where of the 
> death of megatron and hell beast. Apocalypse commanding the remaing 
predacons 
> to victory in the battle field. He then showed a picture of her on 
the throne 
> of cybertron.
